name: VF 380™
description: VF 380™ is a 100% solids, fast setting, plural component, ultra-low shrink, polyurea elastomer and high performance coating. VF-380 is primarily designed for foam, geotextile and other non-reinforced substrates due to its specially designed low shrink formulation, but has excellent bond to steel, concrete, masonry and other properly prepared substrates. VF-380 is an excellent coatings solution for industrial applications requiring a resilient liner for waterproofing or secondary containment.
